judgment_text:
Date of decision: 12th September, 2014

Suman Garg Appellant Versus Jai Parkash and others Respondents

. Whether Reporters of Local Newspapers may be allowed to see the judgment? . Whether to be referred to the Reporters or not? . Whether the judgment should be reported in the Digest?

Present: Mr. Ashok Jindal, Advocate for the appellant.

Mr. V.Ramswaroop, Advocate for respondent No.3/Insurance Company.

For orders, see detailed order of even date passed by this Court in FAO No.228 of 1996 titled as Bal Kishan Garg (deceased) through LRs v. Jai Parkash and others .

!

RATTAN PAL SINGH .10.10 18:07 I attest to the accuracy and authenticity of this document Punjab & Haryana High Court
